subject: You need to provide supporting documents for your finance application

rows.text: Your finance application has been reviewed by the lender and they've asked that you submit some extra documents. You will have received an email from {{lender.contact_email}}. You can follow the link in that email to submit your documents or email it back to them. If you can't find their email, please check your spam folder

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.

sms: Hey {{receiver.contact_name}}, good news! The lender has accepted your application in principal. They just need a few documents. Check your email for more info. Kanda!
